author: Ha m
title: We enjoyed our stay!
text:
Some comments where scaring us
For nothing , we like this hotel very much and we do not have any problem with our stay.
I found it with kids affordable great price and very clean quite and secured , big supermarket beside and near there is small restaurants to have pizza so on .
I highly recommend this hotel for those who come by car or rent a car
Same time those who like to save .
You know what i mean !
You can go around during the day and you come and sleep at night.
There is parking which is secure with camera and code underground i will put photo to have idea , if you drive it slowly to inter and go out no problem, once you go inside , it is big and easy to park.
We will sure come next time we come paris‚ù§
